Entered normal space.defaultscript: {OneOf("{ship.name} is", "")} {OneOf("leaving supercruise", "{OneOf(\"entering\", \"returning to\", \"dropping to\")} normal space")}.
Entered normal space.name: Entered normal space
Entered normal space.description: Triggered when you enter normal space

Jumped.defaultscript:
{OneOf("Destination confirmed","Jump in progress","Telemetry obtained")}.
{ship.name} is {OneOf("heading to", "on route to", "travelling to", "in transit to")} the {P(system.name)} system.
{if system.name = homesystem.name:
    Welcome home.
|else:
    {if lastsystem.allegiance && !system.allegiance:
      You {OneOf("are leaving", "have left", "are no longer in")} {lastsystem.allegiance} space.
    |elif lastsystem.allegiance && lastsystem.allegiance != system.allegiance:
        You {OneOf("are now in", "have entered", "are entering")} {system.allegiance} space.
        {if cmdr.title != "Commander":
            Welcome back {cmdr.title}
        }
    }.

    {if system.visits = 1:
        This is your first visit to this system
    |elif system.visits = 2:
        This is your second visit to this system
    |elif system.visits = 3:
        This is your third visit to this system
    |elif system.visits = 4:
        This is your fourth visit to this system
    |else:
        You have visited this system {system.visits} times
    }.

    {if !system.population:
        {OneOf("This system is unpopulated","There is no human presence here", "Humans have yet to colonise this system")}.
    |else:
        {F("System report - detailed")}
    }

    {if system.distancefromhome:
        {Occasionally(7, "{OneOf(\"You are\", \"Current location is\", \"You are now\")} {Humanise(system.distancefromhome)} lightyears from {OneOf(\"home\", \"{P(homesystem.name)}\")}.")}
    }

    {if system.comment:
        You made a {OneOf("note", "comment", "remark")} {OneOf("about", "for", "on")} this system.  It {OneOf("is as follows", "says", "reads", "is")} {system.comment}.
    }
}
Jumped.name: Jumped
Jumped.description: Triggered when you jump to a different system

System report - detailed.defaultscript:
{OneOf("This is", "This system is", "{P(system.name)} is")}
{if system.allegiance = "Federation":
    a Federation
|elif system.allegiance = "Empire":
    an Empire
|else:
    an independent
}
{if system.government:
    {system.government}
|else:
  system
}
{OneOf("of", "with a population of", "home to", "supporting")} {Humanise(system.population)} {OneOf("people", "souls")}
{if system.power:
    , {OneOf("aligned to", "allied with", "controlled by")} {P(system.power)}
}.

{if system.faction:
  {P(system.faction)} is the {OneOf("controlling", "local", "immediate")} {OneOf("power", "faction")}.
}

{if len(system.stations) = 0:
  There are no stations
|else:
    {if len(system.orbitalstations) = 0:
        {if len(system.planetarystations) = 1:
            There is {OneOf("a single", "a lone", "just one", "one")} planetary station
        |else:
            There are {len(system.planetarystations)} planetary stations
        }
    |elif len(system.orbitalstations) = 1:
        There is {OneOf("a single", "a lone", "just one", "one")} orbital station
        {if len(system.planetarystations) = 1:
            and {OneOf("a lone", "a single", "one")} planetary station
        |elif len(system.planetarystations) > 1:
            and {len(system.planetarystations)} planetary stations
        }
    |else:
        There are {len(system.orbitalstations)} orbital stations
        {if len(system.planetarystations) = 1:
            and {OneOf("a lone", "a single", "one")} planetary station
        |else:
            and {len(system.planetarystations)} planetary stations
        }
    }
}
{OneOf("here", "in this system")}.

{_ TODO: system state}
System report - detailed.name: System report - detailed
System report - detailed.description: Provide a detailed report on a system

Docked.name: Docked
Docked.description: Triggered when you dock at a station.

Undocked.name: Undocked
Undocked.description: Triggered when you undock from a station.
